ACWP is a 501(c)(3) charitable, tax-exempt, non-profit organization. Tax ID#77-0180169
Our Programs
Education -New School Program: Construction of new schools to provide free primary education to children from 1st-5th grades in remote villages in Vietnam. -Higher Education Program: Provides further financial assistance to gifted high school students who have graduated with academic excellence –to obtain education at the university level.
Health -Corrective Surgery Program: Provides corrective surgery for disadvantaged children living in the rural areas and those who suffer with birth defects or other deformities.
Vocational Training -Hoa Sua School: A vocational training program in Culinary, Hotel&Tourism Hospitality, and job placements at international hotel and restaurant.
Special Projects -Saving Children in Crisis: Prevents sexual trafficking of Vietnamese and Cambodian children and young women by providing financial assistance, shelter, and vocational training.
Please visit http://www.acwp.org for complete details and more programs.
1. We focus on children.
2. We help one child at a time.
3. We take on the cases no one else is willing to take.
4. We promote self-sufficiency.
cause.mission: To help disadvantaged children gain self-sufficiency through education, vocational training, and provide preventive health care services, emergency relief program, and short-term financial support.
